property.name: ldap.address
property.description: (Optional) AD/LDAP IP address. If set, it will be used to create /etc/hosts entry for ldap.host

property.name: ldap.protocol
property.description: LDAP protocol. Set to either ldap (for non-secure) or ldaps (for secure)

property.name: domain.name
property.description: Domain name connecting to e.g. AD-HDP.COM

property.name: bind.user
property.description: Bind user e.g. CN=LDAP Access,OU=Service Accounts,DC=AD-HDP,DC=COM
